# Your PR template content

## PR Checklist
- [ ] Linted code (`npm run lint` or equivalent)
- [ ] Formatted code (`npm run format` or equivalent)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build` or equivalent)
- [ ] Tests pass locally with coverage (~80% minimum)
- [ ] (Optional) `npm audit` run for security issues

**Reminder:** Our CI/CD pipeline isn't set up yet - please verify these steps manually!
